00516 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00517 class CmguiMeshWriter : public AbstractTetrahedralMeshWriter<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>
00518 {
00519 protected:

00569     std::vector<unsigned> mReordering;

00585

00593 
00600     void WriteNodeFileHeader(out_stream& rpNodeFile);
00601

00608

00635                     const std::string& rBaseName,
00636                     bool cleanDirectory=true);
